reviewText: A fun and witty read about an artist on the road.
he gives a lot of examples
A really good dvd...lots of information on color, paints, composition, creative design and more.  I highly reccommend this dvd by John hammond, wishing he had more out.

Capturing Light in Acrylics is informative and inspiring.  John Hammond walks you through his painting process with skill and charm.  I learned alot already and my paintings show it.  I would highly recommend.
